items.sentence: If Tom had done that to me, I'd be furious.
Tom used to tell me that I talked too much.
Tom never told me that Mary was his sister.
Did you notice that Tom was looking at you?
I found out why my computer keeps crashing.
What we need now is something hot to drink.
I'm not really sure what I should be doing.
There seems to be only one way out of here.
The big question is what do we do about it.
We've already taken your name off the list.
The band has just finished their first set.
Do you think you'll ever get married again?
Do you have any plans for tomorrow evening?
It doesn't really make much sense, does it?
What was it that Tom took out of the trunk?
Are you sure you didn't recognize that guy?
If I've made a mistake, please let me know.
Do you think that the police will find Tom?
My vet recommended putting my dog to sleep.
Are you sure you don't want to sleep on it?
Aren't you going to go camping next summer?
Are you going to press charges against Tom?
Beat the whites of 3 eggs to a stiff froth.
I advised Tom not to stay up late at night.
Tom borrowed a dictionary from the library.
It's been about a week since I've seen Tom.
Where is Tom going to spend New Year's Eve?
The jig is up! Come out with your hands up!
Tom turned bright red when Mary kissed him.
You should try to learn from your mistakes.
You should try to be a little more patient.
You look like you've lost your best friend.
You knew everyone at the party, didn't you?
You'll teach Tom how to do that, won't you?
You wouldn't ask Tom to do that, would you?
You gave the documents to the wrong person.
You can't make everyone happy all the time.
You should've begun an hour and a half ago.
You have no idea what might happen, do you?
You have everything you really need, right?
You've got to do something about this soon.
You saw what happened in there, didn't you?
You know what's going to happen, don't you?
You'd better tell me exactly what happened.
You didn't happen to get his name, did you?
You never told me what happened last night.
You never know what's going to happen next.
You never cared what happened to me before.
You have every right to know what happened.
You need tell me exactly how this happened.
